snippet.title:
Going mega fast from going through the final proof of my Gershwin piano duet arrangement to seeing it being finally published!
Couldn't be more excited to announce that the sheet music is now officially available from Goodmusic Publishing! You can listen to the computer-generated audio of the piece to see if you like to try it. Hopefully, it’ll find its usefulness in bringing more fun to piano playing!
Rhapsody in Blue by George Gershwin - available from http://www.goodmusicpublishing.co.uk/info/default.aspx?id=GM098#﻿
Meer weergevenMinder weergeven

My first ever sheet music publishing deal has just been signed with A music publisher! It’s for my piano duet arrangement of Gershwin’s Rhapsody in Blue. And it’s the first time ever that my SASE was returned to me without being used ;)
Truly in a celebrative mood now… Happy Valentine's Day everyone!﻿
Meer weergevenMinder weergeven

Happy Birthday George Gershwin (September 26, 1898 – July 11, 1937)
Gershwin was an American composer and pianist who contributed music to the classical and popular music genres. Some famous pieces by Gershwin that you may know are "An American in Paris" and "Porgy and Bess".
Our favorite piece is Rhapsody in Blue. What is your favorite Gershwin piece?﻿
Meer weergevenMinder weergeven · Vertalen

How I've spent my mornings lately: eating leftover desserts from this week's many birthday dinners and practicing the piano again for the first time in a few years :) But since it is my birthday today... I think I had better go bake a cake or something!
And thank you everyone for all the birthday wishes!﻿
Meer weergevenMinder weergeven · Vertalen
